title: Plinth

properties.name: description
properties.value: A plinth is a heavy base usually made to support a statue or other heavy object. It may refer to:

content:
A plinth is a heavy base usually made to support a statue or other heavy object. It may refer to:

  • The Elidinis Statuette in Nardah, which is an empty plinth before completing Spirits of the Elid
  • The plinth found in the middle of the Karamjan Temple during Dragon Slayer II
  • The plinth in the Daeyalt essence mine which formerly held the Stone of Jas
  • The statue plinths in the Varrock castle garden during Garden of Tranquility
  • The Grotesque Guardian plinths found on the roof of the Slayer Tower.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
A '''plinth''' is a heavy base usually made to support a statue or other heavy object. It may refer to:

*The [[Elidinis Statuette]] in Nardah, which is an empty plinth before completing [[Spirits of the Elid]]
*The plinth found in the middle of the [[Karamjan Temple]] during [[Dragon Slayer II]]
*The plinth in the [[Daeyalt essence mine]] which formerly held the [[Stone of Jas]]
*The statue plinths in the Varrock castle garden during [[Garden of Tranquility]]
*The [[Grotesque Guardians|Grotesque Guardian]] plinths found on the roof of the [[Slayer Tower]].

{{Disambig}}
